name: Winning Love by Daylight - A Visual Novel
name_original: Winning Love by Daylight - A Visual Novel
description:
The Winning Love by Daylight visual novel runs along the path of a student slowly realising that superheroes attend his high school. A Super villain has threatened to unmask any superhero vigilantes, as they've discovered they attend the school, and so all of the girls try to act as close to normal students as possible, but that isn't so easy...

Travel through the story of the game which is part of an upcoming Boardgame, and is part of an online webcomic, as you learn more about the characters and their backstories and personalities, as you try and decide who you will invite to the prom.
